name: Penguin Worlds Smash
description:
It's amazing adventure game for kids and adults. There are 15 different adventure easy to hard levels. Control your penguin character and collect the star and fruits much as possible. You need to kill the enemy and completed levels one be one.

Features:
=======
- Beautiful graphics design.
- Easy to play.
- There are 15 different easy to hard levels.
- Supported IOS 11.

So are you ready for play this game? Download Now...
